CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
OldVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document name matches patterns, document size equals or is greater than, document Property Is, and document name contains words or phrases.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Be notified about new form responses on Lists
CurrentVersion.description: Lists forms users can subscribe to be notified of new responses on their forms. By default, this would be toggled off, but a form collaborator can toggle on and receive an email notification for every new response on that form after.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Be notified about new form responses on Lists
OldVersion.description: Lists forms users can subscribe to be notified of new responses on their forms. By default, this would be toggled off, but a form collaborator can toggle on and receive an email notification for every new response on that form after.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Schedule turning on and off responses to forms
CurrentVersion.description: List form owners and collaborators can schedule specific dates and times to start and stop accepting responses. The form will be active during the designated period and will automatically stop accepting responses once the scheduled end time is reached.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Schedule turning on and off responses to forms
OldVersion.description: List form owners and collaborators can schedule specific dates and times to start and stop accepting responses. The form will be active during the designated period and will automatically stop accepting responses once the scheduled end time is reached.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Add attachments to forms
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add attachment fields to enhance their list forms. This feature allows users to upload files directly to the form, providing additional context or necessary documentation.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Add attachments to forms
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to add attachment fields to enhance their list forms. This feature allows users to upload files directly to the form, providing additional context or necessary documentation.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
OldVersion.description: Gather and create notes with Copilot in your personal, non-shared OneNote notebooks directly on the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Microsoft Places - Individual desk booking
CurrentVersion.description: With the addition of individual desk booking via Places Finder, employees can view individual desks, filter by sections, and book a specific desk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Microsoft Places - Individual desk booking
OldVersion.description: With the addition of individual desk booking via Places Finder, employees can view individual desks, filter by sections, and book a specific desk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
OldVersion.description: With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
CurrentVersion.description: This roadmap item is removed as it is a duplication of functionality already delivered. We apologize for any confusion. All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IC3 token authorization on Android-based Microsoft Teams devices
OldVersion.description: All Android-based Microsoft Teams devices including Teams phone, non-touch phones, Teams displays, Teams panels, and Teams Rooms on Android, will use IC3 tokens instead of Skype tokens for modern, secure authorization. Admins can enable ‘Block Legacy Authorization’ to update their tokens when this feature is available.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder colors in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to customize folder icon colors in the New Outlook. This feature lets you change the color of folder icons, making it easier to differentiate and personalize your folders visually. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Show shared folders and mailboxes as accounts in the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: To enhance your experience in Outlook, we’re introducing changes to how shared mailboxes and folders are displayed. Shared mailboxes and shared folders will now appear directly in your account list in the folder pane, alongside your primary account and other connected accounts. This improvement makes navigation more intuitive by treating shared resources as separate accounts, providing quick and organized access. As part of this update, we are removing the "Shared With" node from the folder pane. All shared resources will now be integrated directly into the accounts list for a cleaner and more consistent navigation experience. This update streamlines how shared resources are managed and accessed, helping you stay productive and focused. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Enhanced admin notification settings experience
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a modernized user experience for admin notification settings within Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat – Loop Workspaces in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use ContextIQ to scope to your Loop Workspaces content in the Files tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
